name: Electra Palace Hotel Athens

reviews.text: I stayed for 4 nights and very much enjoyed my stay.
reviews.title: Well located comfortable hotel with attentive service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is well located for both business and tourism. It is close to Plaka and the Parthenon.
reviews.title: Ideal location

reviews.text: The views from the restaurant were wonderful - sitting there watching the lights on the Parthenon was a wonderful experience.
reviews.title: This hotel is comfortable and in a good, central location
Excellent hotel
reviews.text: The rooms, whilst not large were very comfortable and had all the amenities that you would expect in a 5 star hotel.
The staff were very helpful and friendly, providing good suggestions for touring and eating.
reviews.title: I would recommend this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was a beautiful hotel. It is located in a central area, in a tourist area. The staff was great, very helpful and nice. The rooms were clean and the bathroom was big. The breakfast was also really good, filled us up for our day of sightseeing. I also had a chance to use the inside pool while my husband used the gym, it was a nice clean facility. The highlight was the outside pool which we had the view of the acropolis, it was amazing. They also had a pool side bar. We had dinner at their restaurant which had a view of the acropolis.
reviews.title: Beautiful view of Acropolis

reviews.text: We had a great stay and would stay again!
reviews.title: This is an excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The luxurious feeling you have at the lobby is a bit lower in the rooms but in all the time's I've stayed here (more than 5), it has always been very clean and the rooms are comfortable and clean. The breakfast is very good too.
reviews.title: Perfect short stopover

reviews.text: We had a room facing the street with a stunning view from the balcony of the Acropolis. The room was well equipped and the beds were extremely comfortable. The meal in the rooftop restaurant was excellent and a wonderful change from the standard fare; it was light enough for 4 courses to be manageable, beautifully presented and all of the tables have a wonderful view of the Acroplis - floodlit by night. Most of the major sites are reachable on foot from this hotel.
reviews.title: Neoclassical architecture and great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: An excellent hotel centrally located, great environment, while the staff is very friendly and helpful. It is a nice hotel for families too - you can walk around in Plaka, while Syntagma square is near by. Try the restaurant too with the spectacular view over the Accropolis.
reviews.title: Nice hotel in Athens

reviews.text: The best hotel. We stayed there for the Athens marathon. It was perfect. Centrally located, friendly knowledgeable staff, great food. View of the acropolis are sensational. From the balcony. Eat at level 5 restaurant. A memorable stunning stay!
reviews.title: Sensational!

reviews.text: Having looked through what seemed like millions of hotels in Athens we decided to book our stay at Electra Palace Hotel.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel and stay in Athens

reviews.text: Wonderful location, right by Plaka and staff at the hotel were wonderful and very helpful.
reviews.title: Look no further, Electra Palace in Plaka is your destination

reviews.text: Rooms were clean, and just simply decorated. Slightly on the small side from what we are used to but we did get a standard room. Our room was facing the main road but noise wasn't a issue.
reviews.title: Great price/quality ratio

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was great, lots to choose from, from naughty bits to healthy snacks.
reviews.title: Great stay, some issues

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Value for money - cheap 5 star Hotel. Rooms nice, spa ok. Breakfast a little bit too normal. In Plaka, near all main attractions.The rooftop restaurant was with really high quality food and service. Recommend.
reviews.title: Nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Good:
reviews.title: Very good hotel with Excellent Acropolis Views
Amazing Hotel
reviews.text: - Some rooms with balcony and excellent Acropolis views.
- Very friendly and professional English-speaking staff.
reviews.title: Athens sightseeing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - Great value (off season).
reviews.title: Immaculate Stay

description: The ELECTRA PALACE HOTEL in Athens is a five star property, centrally located in the heart of Athens and the old town of Plaka and is within walking distance from Acropolis, all major historical sites and the business and commercial districts. Recently, the Electra Palace has been completely re-constructed, refurbished, expanded and outfit with the most contemporary equipments of the 21st century. The Hotel operates with 102 Standard guest rooms, 33 Superior Acropolis view rooms, 9 Junior Suites, 10 Suites and 1 Presidential Suite. In the property, one can find the "MOTIVO" restaurant, the "ELECTRA" Roof garden restaurant, the traditional English style "DUCK-TAIL" bar with its beautiful garden, a wellness area, an outdoor swimming pool with Jacuzzi and pool bar, an underground parking and a business centre.
